example.name: Transitive
example.text: With each revision, the constitution became increasingly jumbled, while [NA delegates]-9 leveraged their positions *-9 to exact "constitutional amendment rent" and fatten themselves up.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: The many restrictions safeguard Pinglin's beautiful natural setting, but they exact a heavy toll from the local people.
